name: Clonery
description:
Story

In new future our food supplies will be run out. So it is time to create new creatures with our skills!

Controls

Tapping does everything. Tap while blue picker on the base color blocks. 

How to Play

Try to match the correct boxes by tapping the screen. If you match the wrong boxes you get a mutant animal, the mutant animals give you little points. The higher you score, the more animals you can unlock. You can also get in-game energy with points and animals. The game also have endless mod. In this mod you try to make the highest score without matching the wrong boxes.

Goals

Your main goal is to unlock all of the creatures and reach the best score in the game.

Other Information

This short game made for Game 201 Course's final assignment.

Made with Unity in 2 weeks. You can not hack this game. You can reach this game from here.
